sentence.Network_en: You must be credulous if she fooled you with that story.
sentence.Network_cn: 连她那种话都能把你骗倒,你一定是太容易相信别人了.

sentence.Network_en: Mary is so credulous that she may readily accept any excuse you make.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛丽很轻信,你随便找个借口她都可以相信.

sentence.Network_en: We are less credulous than we used to be.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不再像以往那样轻易相信别人了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... credit 相信→不相信） credulous 轻信的→不轻信的） crease 增长→向下增加→减少）.
SSAT词汇表【6老师出品】 - 豆丁网 ... cranberry 〈植〉越橘 credulous 轻信的;易受骗的； cricket 蟋蟀；板球.
流流... ... credible a. 可信的，可靠的。 credulous a. 轻信的，易于相信的。 plausible a. 似乎有理的(可信的)。常带有怀疑的意思。.
GRE选择题历年真题... ... sophisticated:a. 老于世故的，富于经验的，精通的 credulous:a. 轻信的，易受骗的，因轻信而引起的.

list.abs: want credulous ad in cure , hospital of choice distinctive specialized subject makes effective treatment !在治疗中不要轻信广告，选择有特色的专科医院做有效治疗！
even as the dot-com bubbledeflated , credulous bankers and investors began inflating a new bubble in housing .还在互联网泡沫破裂时，轻信的银行家和投资人开始在房地产方面制造新的泡沫。
1046 . Only a credulous person would fall for that old trick ., 只有轻信的人才会被那个陈旧的骗局骗倒 . 无心 1995.
and yet their pitch was convincing precisely because they could explain the nuances of wedding registries to credulous men .但正是由于她们能把网上结婚礼品店的微妙之处向轻信的男人解释清楚，她们的推销才有说服力。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the general sense 'inclined to believe'): from Latin credulus (from credere 'believe') + -ous

entry.def: If you describe someone as credulous, you have a low opinion of them because they are too ready to believe what people tell them and are easily deceived.

example.ex: ...quack doctors charming money out of the pockets of credulous health-hungry citizens.
example.tran: 从那些渴望健康而又容易上当受骗的市民那里骗钱的江湖郎中

means.word_mean: 1. disposed to believe on little evidence;

sentences.sentence: "the gimmick would convince none but the most credulous"

means.word_mean: 2. showing a lack of judgment or experience;

sentences.sentence: "so credulous he believes everything he reads"

auth_sentence.content: But that does not explain the enthusiasm of credulous aesthetes for a dismal painting.
auth_sentence.res_content: But that does not explain the enthusiasm of credulous aesthetes for a dismal painting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But that does not explain the enthusiasm of credulous aesthetes for a dismal painting.

auth_sentence.content: You're killing your credulous low-fat followers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You're killing your credulous low-fat followers.

stems_affixes.word_buile: cred相信+ible能……的→adj.可靠的,可信的
cred相信,信任+ulous多……的→相信太多→轻信的
in不+credulous[adj.轻信的,易信的]→adj.怀疑的, 不轻信的
cred相信,信任+it表抽象名词→ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分
cred相信,信任+ential表形容词或名词→让人相信的东西→凭据
credulous[[adj.轻信的,易信的]]→n.易信, 轻信
cred相信,信任+it表抽象名词→ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分
ac给予+credit[ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分]→给予相信→委托
dis不+credit[ n.&v.信任;贷款;n.学分]→v.不信任,怀疑

sentences.en: I am wholly incredulous of the truth of his story.
sentences.cn: 我根本不相信他说的是真话。

sentences.en: Mary is so credulous that she may readily accept any excuse you make.
sentences.cn: 玛丽很轻信,你随便找个借口她都可以相信。

sentences.cn: 连她那种话都能把你骗倒,你一定是太容易相信别人了。
